sections.general: president/chief executive officer executive profile chief executive with experience in â offering outstanding presentation, communication and cross-cultural team management skills. high-energy, results-oriented leader with an entrepreneurial attitude. skill highlights leadership/communication skills project management employee relations regulatory affairs human resources budgeting expertise market research and analysis â staff development â core accomplishments spearheaded successful completion of aâ $5 million dollar capital campaign.â increased the overall organizational revenue from $10â to $11.5 million. expanded residential services from twenty six (26) to thirty-five (35) bed capacity due to community needs. introduced and implementedâ foster care services â to decreaseâ continuum of service gaps. recognized by the columbus foundation as a nonprofit to watch in 2015.
